IX.iii.1.A.6.g
.
Example:  Reduction of Award After Receipt of Non-Recurring Income
Situation
:  A Veteran receives a one-time payment of income on August 7, 2019.  Pension is reduced for the period September 1, 2019, to September 1, 2020.
Result/Rationale
:  The pension rate change when it occurs on September 1, 2020, will not be an increased award based on a reduction of income.  The September 1, 2020, award line represents a restoration of benefits.
title: M21-1, Part IX, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section A - General Information on the Effect Income and Net Worth Have on Pension and Parents’ Dependency and Indemnity Compensation (DIC)
